snippet: Morgan Tuck scored 24 points as No. 2 Connecticut kept its conference winning streak alive with a 92-58 rout of Temple.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Oklahoma upsets Texas, 70-59, in women's action; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Tuck scored 24 points as No. 2 Connecticut kept its conference winning streak alive with a 92-58 rout of Temple.

headline.print_headline: Texas Women Are Upset by Oklahoma
headline.main: Texas Women Are Upset by Oklahoma
